text.autoconfig.donothitme.option.enable: If this option is disabled, all functions will not take effect
text.autoconfig.donothitme.option.keep_m: Whether to continue the hand swing animation when the attack is cancelled
text.autoconfig.donothitme.option.open_o: Swing off hand when right-clicking (using items)
text.autoconfig.donothitme.option.pat_th: Whether the operation can penetrate entities that are prohibited from being attacked
text.autoconfig.donothitme.title: Don't hit me
